description: Fast analytics and data processing with DuckDB and MotherDuck

motherduck_token.description: Access token to use for MotherDuck database connections

HOME.description: Home directory for DuckDB (used as default if --home-dir not specified)

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS access key for S3 database connections

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS secret access key for S3 database connections

AWS_SESSION_TOKEN.description: AWS session token for temporary credentials (IAM roles, AWS SSO, EC2 instance profiles)

AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.description: AWS region for S3 database connections
